website_summaries.verdict: A healthier option for low-carb diets plus a tasty pasta that cooks nicely.
pros: Has generated a fan base for delicious flavor plus a low-carb recipe – has 18 net carbs per serving
Also has more protein and fiber than most competitors
Fettuccine noodles are versatile for numerous pasta recipes
Cooks firm but tender in less than 5 minutes
cons: Some pasta lovers prefer the taste and texture of traditional recipes
Somewhat costly, but you get a good portion

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this pasta
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pasta. It's low in carbs and it's only 3 SmartPoints for 1 1/2 cups (15 SmartPoints for the whole bag) for those of you doing WeightWatchers. The texture and taste is just like regular pasta. My husband and I love it. The only downfall is that this is the only pasta they make the carba-nada in - I would like to see pasta shells or spaghetti in addition to the fettuccine. But all in all, a great pasta and a great addition to the healthier lifestyle I'm trying to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: I Have ordered these twice. We liked the first batch of six but our recent order is rancid. Everyone knows what that rancid odor is. These have it. I am extremely disappointed. Update....all of the packages are rancid. I am so disappointed. If I decide to give them another chance, I will get a refund of they are rancid. Almost $25 is not an insignificant amount of money to throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Winn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pasta! If you're doing Weight Watchers, it's low point. 3 Smart Points for 1 1/2 cups cooked, or 2 ounces dry. A real WW bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Not low carb
customer_reviews.text: I bought this excited to be able to eat pasta on my low carb diet. Turns out this is 24 grams of carbs per serving! That's not even close to low carb! That's more carbs from one serving than I am trying to eat all day. Shameful false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: Individual packages are not sealed tightly and I was concerned it would be too easy for something crawly to be in there ... also the carton they were packaged in was torn and broken. Not a great buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Helanee

customer_reviews.title: Best Pasta Substitute Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: As perhaps the world’s biggest pasta lover, I never thought I’d find a low carb substitute that could fool me. I mean, I’m the one who likes to eat just plain noodles for a meal. The one who can eat an entire box of pasta by myself. I’ve tried spaghetti squash, zoodles, squoodles, you name it, and all left me sad and disappointed in the the end. Then came these. WOW. With sauce, I CANNOT TELL THE DIFFERENCE. Thank you, thank you, thank you! Now I can eat what I love without skyrocketing my blood sugar!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: These are not low carb
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thinking they were low carb. I ate them and they are lovely no complaint there, but I looked at the back after eating them and was not happy that they have a lot of carbs. The title of the product is carb nada which means no carbs. So if you are on a no carb low carb diet like me this is not a great product. They taste very good though.
customer_reviews.author: KristiV

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have reactive hypoglycemia, so I can't have many carbs. This is the only pasta i can eat and have a normal sized portion and have favorable blood glucose readings. Be sure to only cook it about 3-4 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Pasta with a free zip tie... 😬
customer_reviews.text: Loved the pasta but was pretty freaked out when I found a zip tie in my pot after pouring the pasta into the water!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kerber

customer_reviews.title: Super food for Keto Diets !
customer_reviews.text: I would be going crazy on my Keto Diet if it were not for this Wonderful Pasta! I have to keep my Carb intake to less than 25 grams per day. A two-ounce serving of these, which is almost a plate full, contains about 17 net grams of carbs! That means that I can have Shrimp Alfredo, Spaghetti and Meatballs, and many other dishes, all while keeping my body in Ketosis! Dropping pounds every week now, and eating well while doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyc

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I cooked it al dente it's just like noodles. Once you season it and throw your goodies in it you can't tell the difference. I can't believe it. I'm in heaven. I had to go ahead and make this broccoli mushroom alfredo right away. I'm telling you, it is wonderful! (I only gave it three stars on the value for money, because I think everything is too expensive. Especially the stuff that's better for you! 😬)
customer_reviews.author: Kimbra

customer_reviews.title: NOT For a Sensitive Stomach!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY if you have a sensitive stomach. Loved the taste of these, but NOT worth the pain and suffering you have to deal with all night in the bathroom. Tried them once, going to throw the leftovers away and try and return the other bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a NON Carbs Diet - KETO
customer_reviews.text: If you are on a KETO diet and are craving by eating pasta - because you cannot, of course, NOW YOU CAN. This amazing pasta is one of a kind. My husband bought a box with 6 units ( which at the beginning I must say I became mad of him, saying:- you could try at least one package to see if you'll like!! but when we cooked and made a cheese sauce...OMG!! it's like Fettuccini or even better... the taste, consistency, not so much thick, perfect !!!! He became ULTRA HAPPY. Congratulations for who has an idea to create this pasta. Tks
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Rozenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Happy Low Carber
customer_reviews.text: This pasta is delicious... boil for 3 minutes, rinse, season and toss it around in butter or the sauce.. taste great
customer_reviews.author: Monica M. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Chalky/grainy
customer_reviews.text: These arrived broken and smashed up the seller did make it right, however that does not detract from the fact that these are not low carb but just lower carb noodles and for the cost alone not worth it!! I decided to rescue the few whole pieces from each bag to try the taste and texture and let me tell you they are soft and a bit chalky/gritty!! I would not recommend these in the least! I want to give a higher rating because the seller refunded me, but at the same time it was a waste of time and money for everyone all around for a bad product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ritta

customer_reviews.title: Easy, fast ,great tasting and LOW CARB!
customer_reviews.text: I made these with dinner tonight. It was a hit. Boiling them was really different from traditional noodles because they need to be closely watched. They foam the water and overbook fast! Other than that I LOVE them. My biggest problem with dieting is pasta. I just love it. So now I can diet and have pasta. They taste great and not just my opinion. They were a hit at dinner. I made with chicken broccoli florets and cream of broccoli sauce cooked in my instant pot. Definitely making this meal again.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Not low carb!!!
customer_reviews.text: NOT low carb. Very disappointed. I'll just donate to food bank I usually read the nutritional info but saw the "carb nada". I always Thor nada meant none. Oh well,live and learn. TRUTH in advertising. 😆
customer_reviews.author: R. Frost

customer_reviews.title: These noodles ARE low carb diet approved! They are NOT fad diet/extreme low carb diet approved
customer_reviews.text: Doing the keto fad? Doing the Atkins/extreme low carb fad? Don't get these. Limiting your carbs? Diabetic? Eating reasonable portions and looking to cut carbs where you can while actually having a life and enjoying your meals? These are for you! Doesn't spike blood sugar and tastes AMAZING. Great texture in soups and tossed in sauces. Absolutely LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: Little Harriet

customer_reviews.title: Great low carb product
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE noodles but my body doesn't like carbs. These are a great substitute. My non-carb counting husband thinks they taste just fine. I use them for all my noddle dishes, including spaghetti. As a lot of reviews state do NOT follow the package directions in terms of the amount of time you need to cook them. Even someone who likes true al dente will probably need to cook them longer. I usually cook them 10 to 15 minutes and they are definitely not mushy. Just keep testing until you find the time that suits your taste.
customer_reviews.author: MCB

customer_reviews.title: Great for those on WW
customer_reviews.text: I got these in the mail a couple days ago, and made some tuna casserole out of them. They taste and look exactly like high carb pasta, but they are low carb and extremely delicious. They are only 4 smart points on blue WW plan. Regular pasta is roughly around 8 or more smart points, so that's why i haven't had pasta in 2 months until I found these!! I cooked mine in salted water for 5 min and they came out perfect. My daughter is on WW with me, and she tasted them and said "these could be dangerous" meaning, they are definitely yummy. I definitely will be ordering these again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki S.

customer_reviews.title: Far exceeded expectations!
customer_reviews.text: O M G This stuff is delish! I sauteed some small shrimp in olive oil with garlic powder & crushed red pepper for a kick. I stirred in some Bertolli Alfredo sauce (with basil) & let simmer. I boiled the noodles for 5 min instead of 3 min, & they were perfect. Absolutely delicious! I only eat as close to zero carbs as possible for the rest of the day when I eat these. Holy moly, they are so everything I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: no_deadbeats

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've decided to join the keto craze... ish. I don't follow any guidelines, I knew I eating way too many carbs. Sweets were too easily in my reach. This product is wonderful. The texture is way better than expected. Including pasta in my meal plans has made a huge difference. I feared they would be slimy but the texture is great. The portion is large, so I have less then recommended. I am very happy I decided to try this product. They are dried, so storage is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a low carb lifestyle
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent pasta. There are only 17 net carbs in 1.5 cup serving. I am on a controlled carb diet and have not eaten pasta in a year so to find this was a nice surprise. I still won't be able to eat it with any regularity but it is nice to be able to indulge once in a while and not end up consuming over twice the amount of carbs for less pasta. This tastes excellent. I cannot tell the difference from any other regular pasta. I prepared it with simply butter and a little parmesan cheese topped with sauteed shrimp and it was great. Nice texture and does not turn to mush when cooked.
customer_reviews.author: TV and movie fan

customer_reviews.title: A little different
customer_reviews.text: The mouth feel and cooking method are a little different but because we are watching our calories working from home and I have to watch my carbs/sugar this works great. It's easy and fast to make, add some pesto/marinara/olive oil, add regianno parmesan, some grilled meat/chicken/pork/fish, make a green salad, a bottle of wine and I can get dinner done in half an hour. One pot cleaned before dinner, BBQ handles the grilling. Bought a bunch, will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Tony E.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, you'd be surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes, I was just hoping for a low-carb pasta alternative. I hate cauliflower - anything that smells like something that left the butt will always taste that way. So I tried this. It literally only takes 3 minutes. Which is cool - I can make it in the morning to take for lunch. Doesn't reheat too badly, but make sure it is COOKED and not overcooked or undercooked because then reheating it makes it taste weird. I'm pretty sure I could feed this to my husband and he wouldn't notice. It's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Ouisa

customer_reviews.title: Carba "NADA" should have NADA carbs, right?
customer_reviews.text: Fooled me! I didnt read the label. My search was for keto noodles. Also, the serving size is tiny - 5 per bag. So, this order provides one person 30 days' of slightly lower carb noodles. This product really doesn't meet a low-carb diet lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: MikeInWeston

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting lower carb pasta!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic pasta option for someone who’s on a low carb regimen. I wouldn’t eat this every day bc the carb count per portion is just a bit high, but for those occasions when I want to eat my homegrown tomatoes and homemade pesto on actual PASTA, this product is perfect! I don’t enjoy zoodles or riced cauliflower or spaghetti squash or any of those other attempts to simulate pasta with veggies. The taste and texture of this fettuccine is exactly what I crave, and at less than half the net carbs or regular pasta, I can indulge often enough to prevent feeling deprived.
customer_reviews.author: guenhevir

customer_reviews.title: Yummy pasta on Atkins- finally !!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!! I have been on Atkins since April, and am wanting to add low carb pasta to my diet. I ordered these thinking, "Ya, right!" Not believing the product description. I made it last night for my husband and myself. It was so delicious. It smells just like egg noodles. I did boil it for 5 minutes instead of 3, and it was al dente. I am very pleased. Also, we split a serving and had plenty. The price is very reasonable, cheaper than store bought pasta, and tastes just like egg noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: I am on a low carb diet so having regular noodles or spaghetti is a No! No! These noodles allow me to have a small amount when I am craving pasta with my meatballs and spaghetti sauce! So good! Want to try these noodles for chicken noodle soup next! I did have to cook them about twice as long as the package suggests. They are just a little bit chewy but if you refrigerate them overnight they do get softer like regular egg noodles. I was in heaven to discover these! Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great but not exactly “keto”
customer_reviews.text: Great and relatively low carb BUT Still too high in carbs too be considered keto. Unless of course you eat a smaller serving I suppose. I do recommend these noodles for a low-carb diet because they taste great.
customer_reviews.author: lisa allard

customer_reviews.title: Don’t kill your Keto with these!
customer_reviews.text: The texture is similar to normal egg noodles and the taste is “meh” to me. I was so excited to have some pasta I ate what would be about half a bag of dry pasta and that was about net 70 carbs so be careful! If you are doing Keto don’t eat these. You will kill your Ketosis really quick! That’s what happened to me! Wasn’t worth it, I’ll go back to zoodles.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Pasta for eating Low-Carb
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! It wasn't my favorite pasta, but consider my favorite pasta is freshly made from a pasta machine and cooked straight away. This flavor is on par with any pre-made store pastas. I also find it to be a very filling food with the high fiber content with the added protein from the eggs. I'm not sure what digestive issues people have with this pasta. For me this was like adding more fiber to my diet from any normal high fiber food; so I liked the digestive results. The people that are complaining about diarrhea must have some other abnormal digestive issues with increased fiber in their diet.
customer_reviews.author: Verb

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a spaghetti lover and I needed something healthier to substitute that actually taste good. These noodles are the bomb if you ask me. Now I did cook them a little longer than the instructions so that it could be a little more tender and it worked out perfectly. It gives a whole grain pasta texture as well as taste which is pretty good. My son loved it so now I use it for us both. I’ve also made Lo mein as well as shrimp Alfredo with them. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Naaji B

customer_reviews.title: Great a part of a 50/50 mix with zucchini "noodles"
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big fan of "noodles" (zucchini noodles) but when paired 50/50 with this lowered carb pasta, it works for me. I cut the zucchini about the same size as the cooked carbs-nada, then salt the zucchini to wilt it and draw out exceess water. Rinse the zucchini and toss it in with the carbs-nada for 30 -60 seconds when the pasta is done/near done. It works....its twirlable on a fork and I get the mouthfeel of pasta with much lower carbs. My family loves it this way.
customer_reviews.author: LTC

customer_reviews.title: Great lower carb alternative
customer_reviews.text: I made my first dish with this last night, a skinny version of shrimp fettucine alfredo. It is more al dente than normal pasta (I cooked it 6 minutes or so versus the 3 it said on the package...at 3 it was hard as a rock) but other than that it was just as delicious as fattening, carb-laden fettucine alfredo. Even my Italian fiance was won over! I waited a full 24 hours to write the review because of the reviews that mentioned diarrhea, but this was not a problem for either of us and we had big portions.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGirl

customer_reviews.title: and absolutely LOVE pasta! These are VERY good
customer_reviews.text: I'm on a very low carb, high protein diet, Atkins, and absolutely LOVE pasta! These are VERY good!!!! They satisfy my pasta craving quite well and don't seem to affect my carb intake. Thank you very much Al Dente!!!!!!!!! The texture is a bit thicker, heavier and I had to cook it almost double the time, but it may be because I was cooking a lot at a time. <3
customer_reviews.author: 💗 Christina 💗

customer_reviews.title: Too Al Dente for me but not bad overall
customer_reviews.text: Looking for low carb anything that led me to this Al dente egg fettuccine. These take longer to cook, even though the package says ready in 3 minutes. They are a bit too al dente for my taste, but I suppose I can get used to it. I like these way better than chickpea noodles, taste better too. My blood sugar 2 hours after eating these fettuccine is only slightly higher - would have been much higher if I ate regular noodles instead.
customer_reviews.author: aultraman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent egg noodle/pasta replacement
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these since I was not able to find pasta in the grocery store and was absolutely blown away. They are a little pricey and do take longer to cook than the 3 mins listed on the PKG but the taste is pretty spot-on and worked well with scratch Alfredo sauce and beef stroganoff, so thumbs up for versatility. And for the reviews that refer to the 17g carbs per serving, regular fettuccine has 42g of carbs in a 2oz serving so it's actually 2.5 times fewer carbs than 'regular' pasta. I'm pleased that I gave them a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we like these noodles!
customer_reviews.text: We are on a low carb diet and we found these noodles to be a good alternative. It has enabled us to have beef stroganoff, chicken alfredo and shrimp scampi and Marinara sauce. The noodles are thicker than regular noodles and a little chewy.. but when you have gone without noodles for so long, we are so happy to find some that taste good and work for us. We tried zoodles and just couldn't do it.. these are closer to real noodles and satisfy us and help us to have some of the meals we used to have.
customer_reviews.author: rgolden

customer_reviews.title: It's ok if you are diabetic
customer_reviews.text: These did not raise my blood sugar at all. I was very surprised but be careful not to eat a lot. It kind of sticks in your gut and doesn't digest well. Maybe it's the corn starch in it....digestive resistant cornstarch is not good for the gut. Look it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Not really carbo-nada (nothing)
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 6-bag box of these noodles but when I read the carb info they really aren't "carbo-nada." You would have to be very careful if you are doing keto not to eat too many of these noodles. We did put about 5 noodles in each bowl of chicken soup one evening, though, and agreed that having the noodles in there made it better.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Childs

customer_reviews.title: If on keto do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: If you are on low carb or keto do not buy these. They are kinda hard to cook up. The serving size is half cup!!?? That is like 4 to 6 noodles. I was not impressed, I feel I wasted my money and have this just sitting in my cabinet going to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Riffle888

customer_reviews.title: Very good al dente noodles!
customer_reviews.text: I do like my noodles softer than al dente, and these are definitely al dente after cooking, but that’s what the product promised. I made sauce and meatballs, and honestly, by the time I was eating them with all the flavors, I didn’t mind that they were firm. It was great to enjoy a plate of pasta while low-carb dieting. My husband liked them as well. I’m already thinking about other recipes I can make with them. The 10-ounce bag was a big meal for both of us with a big serving left for a lunch tomorrow. I bought the 6-pack, so the price for a very large meal seemed fair.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yun

customer_reviews.title: Delicious pasta even if you aren’t looking for lower carbs!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this pasta at the beginning of the quarantine period because all other pasta was in short supply. When I realized it was low carb, I cooked some of it and some traditional noodles I had found at the grocery store, thinking only I would like them. But my grandkids tried them and loved them! Next time I cooked only the carba-nada noodles and even the kids said, “Best noodles ever!” So now I am ordering more and we can all eat the same delicious healthier noodles.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: the taste is decent and my stomach felt fine
customer_reviews.text: for a lower carb option, it tastes decent, but do not mistake this for a keto alternative. the carb count is still high, just not as high as regular pasta. i'd suggest shirataki (for something brothy) or zucchini noodles (for something saucy) instead if that's what you're looking for. the texture was pretty close to regular whole wheat pasta and it didn't upset my stomach like another reviewer had mentioned. if you've ever tried edamame pasta, rest assured this is way better than that.
customer_reviews.author: vcw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you're a sucker who believes whatever you're told
customer_reviews.text: This is a total BS product. 17 net carbs per serving is WAY too much for anyone on a keto or diabetic diet. They market this as if its carb free, and plenty of dullards who dont know how to read a label will believe it. What a scam.
customer_reviews.author: D. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like pasta!
customer_reviews.text: I have gestational diabetes. Pasta has been my number one craving. I'm so excited that I found this pasta! I ate a decent sized bowl of it and my sugar was 110 two hours after eating, which is normal for me after dinner. It tastes like normal pasta, but it is a little thicker abs firmer. I cooked mine for 8 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really like this until moms gave me a tip.
customer_reviews.text: Always listen to you mother! So I tried this with the direction and even when I boil it more than the time stated it would still not be as soft I wanted. So I stored it pantry for a few months. Mom decided to throw stuff away and she's like "hey you use this?' I tell her no its not soft enough. smartest thing she told me was to stick it in the pressure cooker till the first whistle goes off. Its actually like pasta now! Mothers know there stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, but not really low carb, more like reduced carb
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I just had them for my Atkins cheat day. They are not really that low carb. 17g per serving and a serving is pretty small, 2 ounces. They are also not cheap, a little less than $4 per 10 ounce bag. But name brand egg noodles run $2-3+ for a 16 ounce bag, so they are not horribly overpriced, like some low carb products are. They are definitely not as good as egg noodles, but as relatively low carb substitutes go, they are tops. I am a little concerned about some of the "digestive issues" I have seen some people pat about. I guess I will find out in a few hours...
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Tasted GREAT tossed with my fresh pesto!
customer_reviews.text: We're doing the low-carb eating style and one of my absolute favorite summertime dishes is home-made pesto from my basil plants. I hadn't eaten regular pasta in about a year and wondered if I'd ever find a good substitute. Well, this is it!! Loved it! Mouthfeel & flavor are identical to regular pasta without the huge carb load. My daughter now is hooked on it as well. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: debussy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy pasta
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled to have this product. As I am trying to lose weight I really missed pasta, some substitutes on the market are not bad but nothing like the real thing. I do Weight Watchers and a cup and a half of this is only 3 points! Best of all, it is delicious, I would never know this was a low carb product. I would highly recommend this product to anyone with weight loss issues and also anyone who just wants to eat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not keto
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT KETO, yes lts low carb but per serving its 17 carbs per serving. Be aware if you're doing keto.
customer_reviews.author: ables

customer_reviews.title: meets the pasta need!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before purchasing, so my expectations were realistic. The noodles are chewier that usual, but I do appreciate the fact that they meet the need for pasta- I love pasta. Many reviews noted gastro-intestinal distress- if you follow the portion size there are no issues (if you eat 2-3 portions a sitting, that can cause issues) : ) Overall, I enjoy the product and will likely order again. It lasts a long time and is nice to have on hand. I ate Seafood fettuccine this weekend with no negative impact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lower Carb and very delicious
customer_reviews.text: This product is pricey, BUT very tasty. It is almost as good as home made pasta. And it quite heavy so you can use a smaller portion. Considerably lower carb than regular pasta and definitely worth the money. I am diabetic so need to cut my carbs and this pasta will help a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome... I am on Weight Watchers. I found these on Amazon. Great product.. Made my discovery at the Weight Watchers meeting today. All the members wrote down the product. Way to go! Oh ya, I boil in water just like pasta. 3 minutes not enough time. Did not break down in soup. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Nice nice nice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a queen of noodles and when I’ve decided to try low carb diet, I felt my life was pretty miserable.... Luckily I found those and honestly they are a little more chewy than the ordinary pasta or noodles, but given their low carb profile, it’s totally a great replacement, and healthier! Go for it and you won’t regret... I cooked it for like 7 minutes though, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: hopping kangaroo

customer_reviews.title: CARB DITCHERS DREAM!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally blown away by this product. Like others trying to cut carbs went the zoodle route. They are fine, BUT.....found this by accident at Amazon and my husband and I are blown away. They are truly the best "PASTA"ever. I actually boil up in my microwave in salted water for 10 min. Perfection. Had the other night as a shrimp scampi that I had sworn off due to too many carbs in regular pasta. Will never be without. They really taste more like fresh pasta then dried. Love love the texture. BRAVO!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan H

customer_reviews.title: Authentic flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite low carb pasta! Tastes like homemade egg fettuccine noodles. 17 net carbs per serving and 15 grams of protein. As a nutrition consultant, I recommend this pasta option to my clients consistently. Only thing I can say is that it takes closer to 10 minutes to cook to the perfect al’dente.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G Kallmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the higher carb noodles!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these noodles because they are lower carb count. It said test at 3 minutes --- not enough time. I ended up with the usual time for cooking -- 8 minutes and perfect. It will take us awhile to use the 6 bags in the order!!!! But so happy to find a noodle I can feel good about eating. Just know it takes about 8 minutes to cook them.
customer_reviews.author: My Favorite Place to Shop

customer_reviews.title: Finally a wonderful, low carb, healthy, delicious NOODLE.
customer_reviews.text: You would never know these are low-carb and so healthy. Takes only 3 minutes to cook. I was shocked as have wasted so much $$$ on other products that I throw away. I am going to share this info with my low-carb groups on social media. I AM THRILLED. Making big pot of chicken noodle soup today during this quarantine and can't wait to use these fantastic noodle. The texture and taste is the best EVER.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  These are great!
customer_reviews.text: We tried these last week and love them! While they're not super low carb, they are far lower than "regular" pasta. These taste like the real deal and are blood-sugar friendly, always a bonus. They also work well as leftovers. Some lower carb pastas that we've tried are great the first day, but after a day or two in the refrigerator, they have a funky texture. Not so with these. HIghly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: New England Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not really low carb
customer_reviews.text: These are good. They aren't ready in 3 minutes like package says. They hit the spot and are lower carb than traditional pasta, but a half serving at 8 net carbs is still a lot when trying to stay at 14 net or less per day to maintain ketosis. I enjoy them on occasion. They bring on carb cravings.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: BEST LOW CARB  PASTA
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! One would not one that this is low carb. This brand is great!! I use the Fettuccine for my Lasagna. Actually the size makes it easier to eat. I recommend to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Skip
customer_reviews.text: Bland rubberband with zero hope of redemption. Taste eactly like corn startch. Dry, chewie, lack luster. All the grave in the world can't help these wanna be noodles. Double the listed cooking time to even be able to cut them with a knife.
customer_reviews.author: michele stolz

customer_reviews.title: Best lower carb option for pasta!!
customer_reviews.text: Super pleased with this product. You get 6 bags for $20 which I think is a great deal. I used an entire bag to meal prep a stir fry and it gave for 8 large servings. I could easily see this being used for many different recipes. Overall: -texture resembles al dente pasta -taste like whatever you cook it in, no strong egg flavor -versatile -inexpensive
customer_reviews.author: C. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic & Delicious!!
customer_reviews.text: I have missed pasta so much since following a low carb plan. I happened to see these as a recommendation and took a chance. I am so glad I did!! I am getting ready to reorder a 3rd time!! They are absolutely delicious!! My family can't even tell the difference. The recommended cooking time on these is 3 minutes. We do not like them that firm. I have found that setting the timer at 8 minutes is perfect. Since they don't have all that starch, they do not stick together in the colander. Always perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: RRB66

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried carba-nada pasta
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hoping it would taste good and was not disappointed. To me the egg fettuccine noodles tasted like homemade noodles and were surprisingly good. The portion size is a good size and filling. For those on keto eating a smaller serving can keep carbs down even lower. A serving size is 1 1/2 cups so split it and mix it with meat and veggies and alfredo and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pasta!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pasta is absolutely delicious! When I started my life style change and needed to start eating healthier alternatives to the kind of things I love(pasta). I heard so many amazing things about carba nada. I have tried multiple flavors and have loved them all. This is such a great deal since I don’t have to pay the gas to drive to the closest store that sells this and me buying it online I end up getting it for cheaper. Not only do my husband and I love this but my children ask for mommy’s special pasta. It’s also super low in points for weight watchers. The texture is more of an al dente noodle which we love.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Low Carb Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: 1. Not 5 stars because product is too expensive for 10 oz. 2. Bazillion stars for taste and texture and uplifting feeling about meal preparation. 3. For instance, back in rotation: Pasta and Italian Sausage, Chicken noodle soup, Chicken Alfredo Fettucine, Garlic Oil Shrimp and Broccoli Pasta, Buttered Noodles with Bacon and Onions.......So good.
customer_reviews.author: Sox fan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell the difference from "real" pasta at all. Wish it came in spaghetti form too. It's a real bonus that it cooks up so fast. I've never told my husband that it's not true pasta and he's never noticed a difference. For sure worth all the calories you can save!
customer_reviews.author: L. Gilpin

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, texture and low carb too!
customer_reviews.text: This pasta is absolutely wonderful! I was recently diagnosed with Type 2 Diabetes and was afraid I'd never have pasta again. My husband and I are so happy to find this on Amazon. Last night I made it with Bertoli Organic Creamy Alfredo sauce, chicken breast and broccoli. It was so good we couldn't believe it was low carb. We will be using this for meal planning every week going forward so we will be stocking up. We highly recommend this product to anyone on a low carb diet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Great noodle that can be made even greater
customer_reviews.text: These taste great and are low carb. The only downside is they are expensive compared to regular noodle. For an even more low carb low calorie experience try mixing these with Shirataki fettuccine noodles. Just rinse the Shirataki noodles in the colander your plan to strain your low carb noodle in strain them with the Shirataki noodle in place, Cuts your carb and calorie intake in half, holds various sauces well and is just plain delicious.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Kjellman

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad that I found this pasta
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I found this pasta! I have type 1 diabetes and find it does not spike my blood sugar nearly as bad as regular pasta if at all. The texture is not bad like most other “low carb” pastas I’ve tried. I do cook mine a few mins longer than the suggested cook time. I enjoy the texture better that way. We dont do pasta dishes too often but now I am so glad I have an alternative for when we’re craving it!
customer_reviews.author: Lenae Rickett

customer_reviews.title: Good Reduced-Carb Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Good reduced-carb pasta that works well with traditional recipes. Try the garlic flavor as well if you’re a garlic lover...you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Bronik

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great, takes more than 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t cook in 3 minutes. At least not on my stove. However, it does taste deliciously like fresh egg pasta. So I don’t care how long it takes because true low carb pasta that tastes like pasta and mouth feel like pasta that actually IS low carb is the culinary unicorn of our day.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenrenee

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta taste and it cooks pretty fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought these only after watching a few tik toks. I saw that they were less in carbs and more eggy. Overall they don’t taste like regular pasta and they cook much faster liek egg noodles. They’re good tho for a quick pasta and pairs well with meat. 10/10 would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Delwara

customer_reviews.title: Great pasta alternative
customer_reviews.text: For the first time in my life, I've begun a low carb diet. I was surprised to see how many carbs were in alternative pastas like lentil pasta. When I found this, it was a game changer! It is pretty low in carbs compared to other pasta alternatives and has a nice texture when al dente. It definitely will be a staple on my diet for the next few months! I'd recommend it to anyone looking to cut carbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Not low carb
customer_reviews.text: I expect something called carba-nada to have zero carbs. Switched to Impastable. Carba-nada does taste good though, because, you know, carbs.
customer_reviews.author: boozebook

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to regular pasta
customer_reviews.text: Best low carb pasta I've tried so far. I boil the noodles way longer than the label recommends (about 15 minutes or more) and they taste exactly like regular fettuccini noodles. I use it for chicken alfredo and chicken noodle soup. Delicious. I only wish the company would make spaghetti noodles, since spaghetti with fettuccini noodles just doesn't hit the spot. But other than that, these are a great noodle replacement and they don't affect my blood sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Moore

customer_reviews.title: Blood sugar spiked to 160 when I put these "nada carb" noodles in onion soup.
customer_reviews.text: I thought the "nada* word on the package meant "no carbs", but I guess not,. My blood sugar reading s;piked to 160 when I added these noodles to some no-carb soup, so I gave the remaining packages of the entire case of noodles to some skinny neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: We use these for soups and they work wonderfully! Much like the consistency of a traditional egg noodle but without all the carbs. We boil our soup and cook the noodles right in the broth so they absorb the delicious flavors. Also absolutely delicious with a homemade alfredo sauce! Highly recommend this product for fellow low carbers like ourselves!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not low carb. Deceptive!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely deceptive. If the brand is carba nada you would assume it has nada carbs right? Wrong! 20 grams of carbs for 1/5 of the package. It says 5 servings but two are more realistic. So unless you have a generous carb allotment they won't work for keto.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I can enjoy pasta again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST low carb noodles I have ever had!!! I can actually noodles/pasta that tastes like noodles/pasta! I have made them as fetticini alfredo, "spaghetti" and meatballs, butter noodles, beef strogenof all dishes that I used to have to pass on the pasta I don't have to anymore!!! Delish!!!! I do recommend the 3 min cook time is for cooking 1 serving.. I cook 2 servings generally and it takes 6 mins to perfection!
customer_reviews.author: michael w west

customer_reviews.title: Best egg noodles ever! You’ve never know they’re keto
customer_reviews.text: Best egg noodles I’ve ever tasted, they’re delicious with the chicken Alfredo keto style! Six large bags, two bags that our family of eight
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Oh, lower carb pasta, that tastes like PASTA
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other low carb pasta products, and have thrown out many of those pasta dishes! This one is the real deal, not carb free by any means...However, at least when I spend time making a pasta dish, nobody can tell that it's low carb. I don't eat it all the time, but when I do, nothing ever gets tossed out. My wish is that they would make this brand into lasagna flats!
customer_reviews.author: Orene Morin

customer_reviews.title: Very poor shipping method.
customer_reviews.text: When our box of pasta arrived the box was not damaged, however the bags of pasta inside were so broken up that it's beyond being usable. If you wanted pasta crumbles that's what we got. What a shame and what a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: H. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect it to taste like pasta
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. We cooked this stuff for the recommended three minutes and thought it had the consistency and flavor of moistened cardboard. Cooking it for fifteen minutes made it more edible consistency-wise, but didn’t improve the flavor. If you positively absolutely have to have something lower in carbs, it could be a “carrier” for a really flavorful sauce. But don’t expect it to taste like pasta.
customer_reviews.author: Steel Magnolia

customer_reviews.title: Finally low carb pasta that is GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a review writer but after reading some of the negative reviews I wanted to give my honest opinion. Carba Nada noodles are GREAT. They basically have little to no taste - which means no weird after taste. The pasta is thinner and less filling then regular pasta. If you are using a tasty sauce with them there's no difference then reg pasta and you have succeeded in cutting your carb intake by half. The high fiber count is a plus for carb watchers. Only downside was I didn't care for however they reheated, gummy texture. I definitely will continue to buy these pricey bags of pasta!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Baker

customer_reviews.title: Lacking taste and shelf life
customer_reviews.text: With a texture of warm cardboard, I honestly can't recommend this. Understandably, if you absolutely have to avoid carbs this is at least edible and will act as a sauce conveyance. Also, be aware that you need to keep an eye on the expiration date. The six bags I got only had a six weeks shelf life, the best by date was mid-October of 2019.
customer_reviews.author: PA Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative
customer_reviews.text: Lifesaver. I just try not to over do it with carbs and not have weird tasting food because of it. This is really great. I do macaroni, spaghetti, casserole, beef stroganoff, etc with it. My mom is diabetic and picky. She seems to like it too.
customer_reviews.author: Ponyo

customer_reviews.title: Aww, pasta ♥️
customer_reviews.text: I had lost 35 lbs since November, so that means no pasta or bread. So when I came across those noodles I was super excited. I cooked them next day, add a little cheese and sauce and it came out delicious. I am super excited that I can now eat pasta, especially the one that doesn’t taste like cardboard
customer_reviews.author: fluffywitch

customer_reviews.title: Is this really low-carb?
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good but there are way too many carbs for a low-carb diet. The serving size is teeny tiny and there are still a lot of carbs relative to other low-carb foods. There's always a catch with these things... grumble grumble.
customer_reviews.author: kate82w

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: These are an acceptable lower carb substitute for the real thing. I have liked them better if cooked a minute or two longer than what they recommend on the package. It would be hard to overcook them to mushiness like regular pasta but if you under cook them they could certainly be cardboard like. They don't bring a weird flavor type element to their taste like some bean based varieties I have tried. I am on my second case of them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sells

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply delicious. Not as eggy tasting as others and fool my children into thinking it’s normal pasta! I do low carb for my type 1 diabetic daughter and so it’s nice for that, but sadly does still spike her. But good for an occasional pasta night!
customer_reviews.author: meg4709

customer_reviews.title: I can have pasta again!
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this pasta, and it does fill the gap. The texture is not quite like regular pasta, but not unpleasant. I started testing for doneness at 3 minutes, but at 12 minutes, the fettucine actually was still al dente. I was just too hungry to wait longer. I am glad to have a pasta option again.
customer_reviews.author: Margie M.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious carb conscious pastA option
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I've incorporated it into my family's meals seamlessly. Great flavor and consistency. I cook longer than the package directs and cones out very well.... It DOESN'T taste like fake pasta like many other low carb options. I love that the carb count is 1/2 of other pastas
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Catalan

customer_reviews.title: A solid noodle substitute
customer_reviews.text: By far the best fettuccini I’ve tried, prepared al dente it has a full flavor and tender consistency. Goes well with any pasta recipe so far, from cream sauces to seafood. The fact that it’s relatively low carb means I don’t feel the same guilt and heaviness that normal pasta gives me.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Axelrod

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got these from another website with much higher price plus high shipping. I’ve come to prefer these over all other pasta. At this price they are affordable to use frequently. The taste, ease of preparation and consistency are great!
customer_reviews.author: C. L. Swearingen

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good for low carb!
customer_reviews.text: Currently watching carbs but still wanted to have pasta in the house for cheat meals. Noodles have a good consistency and are quite filling (I prepared mine with a mushroom cream sauce), but have yet to eat them just plain or with a little butter/parmesan. I didn't notice any funky aftertaste which these type of foods usually have. Would also like to try the garlic and spinach varieties but I think they are a little higher in carbs. Unfortunately foods like this do cost a bit more, but for only having once in a while its a pretty good buy. Would definitely recommend to fellow waist watchers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy G

customer_reviews.title: Try ten minutes
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I’ve gotten these noodles. My wife made them for me after five minutes and I didn’t like the texture. She tried 10 minutes and they were so much better I know no one has said to boil them for 10 minutes but please try it it makes it taste like Olive Garden pasta. We just add Parmesan cheese a little bit of salt in the water. Trust me if you don’t like the taste of Tshui noodles try 10 minutes and the consistency is much better. These are terrific and relatively cheap considering you’re getting a specialty item.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Oliva

product_meta.title: Al Dente Carba-Nada Egg Fettuccine, 10-Ounce Bags (Pack of 6)
product_meta.description: Size:10 Ounce (Pack of 6)All natural. For your low-carb, fit and healthy lifestyle! You really can have your pasta and eat it, too! A little pasta tossed with lots of other healthy ingredients is so nutritious, good and satisfying. Here's to your low-carb, fit and healthy lifestyle!
feature_bullets: Case of six 10-ounce bags (total of 60 ounces)
Low-carb, all-natural, hand-crafted roasted-garlic egg fettuccine; 18 net grams carb per serving
Made of semolina flour, defatted soy flour, wheat gluten, digestive-resistant cornstarch, whole eggs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
